name: Stickman.io
description: Stickman.io Figure - the continuation of the legendary game stickman warriors with ragdoll physics.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: with 1024 MB VRAM compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
